channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Announcing July PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The seventh Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, July 19th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – June 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in June.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - June
item.description: The new PrestaShop 8.1, ongoing work on PrestaShop 9.0, new content in the developer documentation and more! Read about all this news in the Core Monthly report for June.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 Is Available
item.description: We are pleased to announce that PrestaShop 8.1 is officially available.

item.title: Freelance Developer and Translator: Meet SNor42
item.description: Have you ever wondered who’s hiding behind a Crowdin username? It’s time to find out! Contributor interviews are a great way of getting to know the people who participate in the PrestaShop project.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - June 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the sixth time this year and streamed live on June 21st, 2023.

item.title: Announcing June PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The sixth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, June 21st, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – May 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in May.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - May 2023
item.description: In May, we released PrestaShop 8.1 RC1, shared some exciting news about PrestaShop 9, and continued improving the core and the modules. Let’s take a closer look at recent developments in the project in May.

item.title: PrestaShop ZIP archives repository is available
item.description: In order to make sure old release packages remain available for anyone who needs them, we published a new GitHub repository “ZIP Archives”, which aims to store all published PrestaShop ZIP archives.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 Release Candidate Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: We are happy to announce the first release candidate of PrestaShop 8.1.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - May 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the fifth time this year and streamed live on May 17th, 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 is ready for translation
item.description: PrestaShop’s 8.1 beta release was announced a few months ago. The stable release is now just around the corner. While it brings new features, a new version also means new strings. A file containing all 8.1 strings has been pushed to Crowdin, and is ready for translation!

item.title: Announcing May PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The fifth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, May 17th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop 9 minimum PHP version will be PHP8.1
item.description: The develop branch contains the source code that will give birth to PrestaShop 9. This is the future of PrestaShop: it will be released either at the end of the year 2023 or at the beginning of the year 2024 and must carry on the ambition of the project for 2024. This major version must also embrace the change in the PHP ecosystem, and consequently, it must drop the support of obsolete PHP versions.
